body:
Can I recommend you look at the way this is done for C++, and try to keep
the same data structures as it has. By doing so you'll already have front
ends for several idls already in place, and so you'll just need to provide
new backends for Python.

On Sun, Jul 10, 2016, 10:58 PM Harsh Vardhan notifications@github.com
wrote:

> First try to add support for other serializers. Tried to refactor the
> 
> ## python code generator to not directly depend on protobufs.
